 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צוּף‎</span>] **verb** ==flow, overflow==, [==float==] (Late Hebrew ***id.***; so Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎טוּף‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; — Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***skin-raft*** is loan-word [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>220</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָפוּמַֿיִם עַלרֿאֹשִׁי‎</span> [[Lam.3.54|Lam 3:54]] (figurative). 

**Hiph\`il 1.** ***Perfect*** ***cause to flow over***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵצִיף אֶתמֵֿי יַםסֿוּף עַלפְּֿנֵיהֶם‎</span> [[Deut.11.4|Deut 11:4]]. 

**2.** ***cause to float: Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּצֶף הַבַּרְזֶל‎</span> [[2Kgs.6.6|2Kgs 6:6]].
